content:
A healthy pasta dish that can be made with 5 ingredients or less might be:

* Whole wheat spaghetti
* Cherry tomatoes
* Garlic
* Olive oil
* Basil

This dish contains whole wheat spaghetti which provides more fiber and nutrients than regular pasta. The cherry tomatoes are a good source of vitamin C and lycopene. The garlic provides flavor and has been linked to various health benefits. Olive oil is a healthy fat and basil provides freshness and flavor. Cook pasta, sauté garlic and cherry tomatoes, mix it with pasta, add olive oil and basil on top.
